text: Ideal College Senior High School is a coeducational second-cycle private institution in the Greater Accra Region of Ghana. ==Campuses== There are two campuses, one at Tema and the other at Legon. ==Notable alumni== *Caroline Esinam Adzogble, educationist, education entrepreneur and philanthropist ==See also== * Education in Ghana * List of senior high schools in Ghana * List of Seventh-day Adventist secondary schools ==References== Category:Educational institutions with year of establishment missing Category:Christian schools in Ghana Category:High schools in Ghana Category:Private schools in Africa Category:Secondary schools affiliated with the Seventh-day Adventist Church Category:Tema
title: Ideal College Senior High School
